questions.question: Every nation has …………………. traditions.
questions.description: It's means it is or it has.

questions.question: It is time you ……………………. those carpets.
questions.description: After it’s time, a past tense is used with a present meaning.

questions.question: I …………………….. the bag on the table.
questions.description: Laid is the past tense of lay to lay is to put something down flat.

questions.question: She earns ……………………. money than I do.
His essay was chosen because it had the ……………………. mistakes.
questions.description: Use fewest with plural nouns and least with uncountable nouns.

questions.question: You look …………………… What happened?
questions.description: Look is a copular verb we use adjectives, not adverbs to modify copular verbs.

questions.question: I can’t make him ……………………. to me.
questions.description: Make is followed by object + infinitive without to.

questions.question: I had to shout to make ……………………….. heard.
She might not ……………………… to come with us.
questions.description: Might is followed by an infinitive without to.

questions.question: She got married ……………………. her college sweetheart.
questions.description: We use to after get married.

questions.question: ……………………… our party will win the election.
Do you mind people …………………….. you what to do?
questions.description: We use ing forms or if-clauses after do you mind…? And would you mind….?
